name: DRC Infotech
description:
DRC Infotech is an award winning web development company based in the IT hub of the world - India.
We specialize in creative website designing and development, customized software development, Web programming, product development, Content Management Systems (CMS), ERP application development and mobile application development.
We have a team of 120+ qualified programmers having expertise in technologies like .NET, MVC, PHP and other Open-source (WordPress, Magento, Joomla, Drupal & TYPO3) and Android & iOS to serve the businesses world-wide. 

We understand our client’s expectations to work within a tight budget and so we have made up our goal to deliver timely, cost effective solutions with impeccable quality and consistency. 
We strive to provide a personal and friendly service, working closely with clients from concept to completion on every project. Most importantly, we want you to be comfortable with us and be delighted with the work we do for you.
